content:
In Nizhyn, which in Chernihiv region, the first veteran space was "unbreakable" in the region.

About thisreportedDeputy Chairman of the Chernihiv Ova Ivan Vashchenko.

“Free services of a lawyer, psychologist are available in Habbi; There is a gym, a nursery, a coffee shop; Different activities are planned, ”he said.

Ivan Vashchenko stressed that the space is as convenient as possible - in the city center.

"It was able to equip it with the joint efforts of the authorities and the public, including international grant support," he added.

As reportedArmyinform, in the Kyiv region in cooperation with a philanthropist from the United States will build a modern rehabilitation hospital for the military.
title: In Nizhyn the first veteran space "indomitable" was launched in the region
description: This was announced by the deputy chairman of the Chernihiv Ova Ivan Vashchenko. “Habbi is available ...
author: Army Inform
